headline: Does The Current Illinois Tool Works (ITW) Price Align With Its Cash Flow Potential
summary: If you are wondering whether Illinois Tool Works is fairly priced or offering value right now, you are not alone. This article will help you frame that question clearly. The stock most recently closed at US$255.12, with returns of 2.3% over the last 7 days, 0.6% over 30 days, 2.3% year to date, 6.8% over 1 year, and 17.3% and 41.0% over 3 and 5 years respectively. This provides useful context before comparing the price to the underlying value. Recent coverage of Illinois Tool Works has...
